name: GraveYard Rob
description:
Equipped with only a sword and a shovel, you fight ghosts and demons as you try to dig, rob and steal illegal stashed gold from a grave in the middle of a rainy night.

Rob, who is a professional grave robber got the news around town, that someone faked their death and hid all their illegal wealth in their grave. Before they themselves come back to get their gold, why don't you pay it a visit?

Fight Ghosts who chase you down and attack you up close,

and Demons who cast spells that attack you with spikes from underneath

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - > Movement

Mouse -> Camera

Space + Direction -> Dodge (costs stamina)

Left Click -> Light attack\Dig Grave\Steal Gold

Right Click -> Heavy Attack (costs stamina)

E -> Start/Stop Carrying wheelbarrow
